title: Russia Orders Retreat From Kherson, a Serious Reversal in the Ukraine War
description: Russiaâ€™s position had grown perilous in Kherson, a strategic city and one of the biggest prizes seized in its Ukraine invasion, but Russian hawks reacted angrily to the withdrawal.
dc:creator: Marc Santora, Andrew E. Kramer, Dan Bilefsky, Ivan Nechepurenko and Anton Troianovski

media:content.media:description: Ukrainian soldiers in the Kherson area on Wednesday. The announced retreat from the city is one of the most significant setbacks for Russia in the war so far.
